mapper.select: SELECT A.garden_dt AS managementDate , A.garden_gb AS gardening , B.plantPic , plantName , CEIL(COUNT(*) OVER() / #{size}) AS totalPage , COUNT(*) OVER() AS totalElement FROM garden_master A INNER JOIN ( SELECT B.odata_image AS plantPic , B.odata_name AS plantName, FROM plant_master A INNER JOIN opendata B ON A.plant_odata_seq = B.odata_seq WHERE garden_user_seq = #{userSeq} ) B WHERE garden_user_seq = #{userSeq} AND garden_dt = #{managementDate}
